pullRequest.title: Add Subscription Throttling Policy
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds the capability to add, edit and delete Subscription Rate Limiting Policies in the new Admin Portal.
List Policies

Add New Policy

afterCommit.message: Add custom attributes to subscription policy UI

nodes.bodyText:
we don't  need to use lambda here right? component accept just component class/function.
component: SubscriptionThrottlingPolicies
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -214,7 +215,7 @@ const RouteMenuMapping = (intl) => [
                     defaultMessage: 'Subscription Policies',
                 }),
                 path: '/throttling/subscription',
-                component: () => <DemoTable />,
+                component: () => <SubscriptionThrottlingPolicies />,

nodes.bodyText: we don't need this prop validation right?

commit.message: Fix Add and Delete functionality for Subscription Throttling
Add Edit functionality for subscription policy
Add custom attributes to subscription policy UI

beforeCommit.message: Add custom attributes to subscription policy UI

+/**

+export default function ListSubscriptionThrottlingPolicies() {
+    const intl = useIntl();

+                filter: true,
+                sort: false,

+    const emptyBoxProps = {

+    const addButtonOverride = (

+
+    /**
+     * Populate subscription policies
+     * @returns {Promise} The list of subscription policies
+     */
+    function apiCall() {
+        let subscriptionThrottlingvalues;
+        return restApi.getSubscritionPolicyList().then((result) => {
+            const subscriptionPolicies = result.body.list.map((obj) => {
+                if (obj.defaultLimit.requestCount !== null) {
+                    return {
+                        policyName: obj.policyName,
+                        quotaPolicy: 'Request Count',
+                        quota: obj.defaultLimit.requestCount.requestCount,
+                        unitTime: obj.defaultLimit.requestCount.unitTime + ' '
+                        + obj.defaultLimit.requestCount.timeUnit,
+                        rateLimit: (obj.rateLimitCount === 0) ? 'NA' : obj.rateLimitCount,
+                        timeUnit: (obj.rateLimitCount === 0) ? 'NA' : obj.rateLimitTimeUnit,
+                        policyId: obj.policyId,
+                    };
+                } else {
+                    return {
+                        policyName: obj.policyName,
+                        quotaPolicy: 'Bandwidth Volume',
+                        quota: obj.defaultLimit.bandwidth.dataAmount + ' '
+                        + obj.defaultLimit.bandwidth.dataUnit,
+                        unitTime: obj.defaultLimit.bandwidth.unitTime + ' '
+                        + obj.defaultLimit.bandwidth.timeUnit,
+                        rateLimit: (obj.rateLimitCount === 0) ? 'NA' : obj.rateLimitCount,
+                        timeUnit: (obj.rateLimitCount === 0) ? 'NA' : obj.rateLimitTimeUnit,
+                        policyId: obj.policyId,
+                    };
+                }
+            });
+
+            subscriptionThrottlingvalues = subscriptionPolicies
+                .filter((policy) => policy.policyName !== 'Unlimited')
+                .map((obj) => {
